about_the_game:
This DLC enables adult (uncensored) content during the romance CG scenes and nudity in the pin-up scenes. Additionally, a new puzzle minigame is accessible from the Gallery screen, which will let you unlock nude versions of several pictures present in the game!

Requires the main game House of Chavez to download

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains explicit uncensored sex scenes, as well as nudity.

All characters included in the game are over the age of 21.

This DLC is only for those who are of legal age and wish to see such content.

detailed_description:
This DLC enables adult (uncensored) content during the romance CG scenes and nudity in the pin-up scenes. Additionally, a new puzzle minigame is accessible from the Gallery screen, which will let you unlock nude versions of several pictures present in the game!

Requires the main game House of Chavez to download
name: House Of Chavez - uncensor patch
short_description: The uncensor patch enables adult content and puzzle mode on the game House of Chavez
